::Battera::

She was will releif and satisfaction as Iron Raptor said she w=
ould go 
the talks.  She breathed a sigh of relief and smiled.  "Thank you.=
 
Thank you so much."  She looked around the room at the others."As I 
said=
, My friend is at the entrance waiting to be let in.  CyberShark 
will guid=
e you to the embassy.  I will stay here and.." she paused 
and looked down,=
"I'll remain here as collateral." She then looked up 
and looked at the oth=
ers.  "Can I go  and get him from the entrance?  
Or do you want to give hi=
m a security check first?" 

Her spark raced as she knew she had finally co=
mpleted part of her 
mission.  She hoped that Iron Raptor would be able to =
bring sence and 
open mindedness to the peace talks.  She was thrilled and =
over joyed 
that the talks would continue despite all that had happened.
